Reviews.Title: Definitely unlocked; Australian plug, but adapter included
Reviews.Author: creditwhereitsdue
Reviews.Content: Phone is indeed new and also works well in Europe.  The plug on the charger is the slanted Australian version, but seller includes an adapter for US outlets, as well as USB cable.  If you are looking for a smaller size smartphone that is more portable, without being locked into a contract, this is a solid choice.UPDATE: After problems with the adapter, seller promptly sent TWO replacements.  This is a reliable company.  Satisfied with the service.

Reviews.Title: The price was right for my needs
Reviews.Author: Daniel1234
Reviews.Content: This was good deal for me.  I wanted to avoid another contract but also wanted a smart phone. This one is suitable for me, but it is not a fancy phone. It has been very dependable so far. No crashes or unwanted resets. The battery life is great.  My only dislike is the camera. I miss having a higher resolution camera. Other then that is has everything else the other nicer phones have.

Reviews.Title: Phone just stopped working
Reviews.Author: Daniel Stern
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my 13 yr old daughter. She treated this phone (her first) with kid gloves. After having this device for just over 3 months it just stopped recognizing the SIM. So no phone calls just WiFi . I checked the return policy and for some reason it isnt eligible for a return.I did a factory reset, reflashed the ROM ( I work at a mobile sw house) and nothing worked.No idea who to turn to, but you wont find me buying from these guys again!

Reviews.Title: bad reception
Reviews.Author: Susan Schwan
Reviews.Content: phone gets bad receptionit sounds like your in a fish bowl most of the time .I would not recommend

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD  BUY
Reviews.Author: NamCo 242
Reviews.Content: this phone works great. its not my Favorite, it comes with two back door battery  covers grey and yellow And this feel very  light weight
